page.title: 03Whitehills Picnic Area
page.content:
A tourism related project in process at{Whitehills}is the development of a picnic and strolling area between the{Fishing Harbour}and {Blackpotts Play Park,}on ground previously used for dumping silt dredged from the harbour. Weathered and with the salt leached out, the silt will provide material for site levelling and landscaping.
A joint project of {Whitehills {& District Playing Field Association and {Whitehills and Boyndie Community {Council,}the village's political 'front' the scheme attracts 100% grant from the{Scottish Development Agency,} (under Â£10 000)
The completed project will have access to both{Harbour and Play Park with separate car and coach parking.
